description: This file defines mock classes for testing components related to display information, connection properties, HDR properties, display properties, and graphics properties within a multimedia or display framework. It includes mock implementations using Google Mock for interfaces such as IConnectionProperties, IHDRProperties, IDisplayProperties, and IGraphicsProperties.

classes.name: ConnectionPropertiesMock
classes.description: Mock class for testing connection property interactions, emulating IConnectionProperties interface.

classes.name: ConnectionPropertiesNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class for testing notifications related to connection properties.

classes.name: HDRPropertiesMock
classes.description: Mock class for testing HDR properties interface interactions.

classes.name: DisplayPropertiesMock
classes.description: Mock class for testing display properties interface interactions.

classes.name: GraphicsPropertiesMock
classes.description: Mock class for testing graphics properties interface interactions.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback in connection properties.

methods.name: IsAudioPassthrough
methods.description: Mocks querying whether audio passthrough is enabled.

methods.name: Connected
methods.description: Mocks checking if the connection is active.

methods.name: Width
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the width of the display.

methods.name: Height
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the height of the display.

methods.name: VerticalFreq
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the vertical refresh frequency.

methods.name: WidthInCentimeters
methods.description: Mocks retrieving display width in centimeters.

methods.name: HeightInCentimeters
methods.description: Mocks retrieving display height in centimeters.

methods.name: HDCPProtection
methods.description: Mocks retrieving or setting HDCP protection status.

methods.name: PortName
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the port name of the display connection.

methods.name: Updated
methods.description: Mocks the notification callback for connection property updates.
